news.title: Censored Chinese Search Project is “Terminated,” Google Rep Testifies
news.description: A Google representative announced that it has ended work on Project Dragonfly, its controversial Chinese search engine.

news.title: Appeals Court Rules Amazon Can Be Held Liable for Third-Party Products
news.description: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit recently ruled that Amazon may be held liable for faulty products sold by third parties sold on its platform.

news.title: US Appeals Court Rules Trump Violated First Amendment by Blocking Twitter Followers
news.description: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit ruled that President Trump’s blocking of critics to his Twitter account was unconstitutional viewpoint discrimination under the First Amendment.

news.title: Employee Activism is Alive in Tech. It Stops Short of Organizing Unions.
news.description: Tech workers in Silicon Valley have increasingly engaged in activism, though not formation of unions, at some of the largest companies in the region.
